website_summaries.verdict: Although the price falls on the higher end of the spectrum, this eye massager is a worthwhile splurge for those who want a spa-like experience at home.
pros: Massages with relaxing warmth and air pressure with a built-in speaker for playing music
Has a rechargeable lithium battery that provides long life
Folds easily for storage or travel
Sleep mode offers a soft, soothing massage
cons: Rare reports of the unit failing to work after about a year

customer_reviews.title: quite comfy
customer_reviews.text: Received the massager this morning. So far, I have tried the clear mode and beauty mode, works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: user A

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, works great!  Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Received intact! Packaging was well done. My techie friend who installed it said it was an easy installation, though the fit wasn't perfect. It looks great and works great, the only issue is the black edge sometimes obscured the time and notices area.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lay

customer_reviews.title: Good to buy
customer_reviews.text: Very great massager! The air compress design is awesome! It makes me feel like a human finger massage me.
customer_reviews.author: ikanvan

customer_reviews.title: It's light and perfect size :)!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it it i got it 2 days ago and i loveee it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and broken on the first day.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, but as soon as I tried to charge it, the device didn’t even light up. It was broken upon arrival, ups is late to come pick up this trash product I’m returning. Didn’t even get to use it, basically useless waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: fine
customer_reviews.text: this product is working well but with some annoying noise even you switch to sleeping model.
customer_reviews.author: Big buyer

customer_reviews.title: Eye massager
customer_reviews.text: This was a nightmare! Way too forceful. It was like the massager was trying to crush my skull. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit, second screen I have replaced on this tablet and in the center of the screen on both straight across there is a dead spot but I use my key board most of the time so is not too much of a bother, just annoying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Just after two month, one mode already does not work.
customer_reviews.author: hh

customer_reviews.title: bought for wife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's birthday and she loves it, now she sleep much better and am very rested for the next day, I did take the insurance on it for 3 years to make sure it keeps working for her.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Turned out better than I expected. I really like this device.
customer_reviews.author: A.Y

customer_reviews.title: great little scale!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little scale. easy to use. I bake a lot of bread and it is so important for recipe conversions. it takes up little space on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: kate h.

customer_reviews.title: It's nothing to do with this particular product but, ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing to do with this particular product but, this part is not the simplest thing to install. I knew that going in. I've repaired many computers/laptops for myself, friends, and family. This was my first shot at a tablet. My granddaughter stepped on it (Can you fix it PawPaw?). I'm proud to say it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W.

customer_reviews.title: causing  skin allergy reaction
customer_reviews.text: wanted to make it work for my wife's dry eye. Easy to use and likes the light music, but her skin is so reactive to the glass seal and redness around the seal area caused by the glass won't go away in few days. What kind of material it uses for that? Otherwise it may be a fun thing to try out
customer_reviews.author: PeterC

customer_reviews.title: The best eye massager
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye massager so much. At night when ai put them in sleep mode Im sleep before the cycle is over. The heat and temple squeezing just takes me away. I love that I can adjust the sound and even download my own music or sounds. High quality and durable, did I say I love this eye massager. I can wven see my dark circles disappearing.
customer_reviews.author: wanda banks

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked wonders for my dry eyes. It is why I purchased and it really works. Relaxing and fun to use. I am addicted to this product and when I don't use, my eyes itch and cause me problems. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Good item, fits the product nicely
customer_reviews.text: Good item, fits the product nicely. The adhesive peeled off with the clear sticker - but I had some double sided tape that worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful till it dies
customer_reviews.text: I loved this and depended on it. Mine died today just over a year after I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Brinly

product_meta.title: BAIYEA Eye Massager with Air Pressure, Music, Vibration and Heat Compression Therapy, Wireless Rechargeable Foldable Temple Massager for Eye Care, Dry Eyes, Stress, Headaches Relief
feature_bullets: 3 Modes for Eye Massage: Providing Intelligent eye massager air pressure, gentle vibration massage and hot compression. And built-in soothing music.(Music can turn off).Choose the mode according to your specific requirement, helps you stimulate blood circulation, Relieves eye strain, eye puffiness, dry eyes, sinus pressure and headaches. Relaxes you mind and helps you sleep better.

Air Compression and Vibration: Moderately air compression strength helps you alleviate eye fatigue, pain, stress and puffiness around your eyes massager with heat while tender vibrating power protect your eye muscle from hurting.

Super Soft and Fit All People: Excellent comfortable plastic cover and the inner cloth adopted skin-care material to utmostly comfort your facial skin. The firmness of black head band can be adjusted to fit your face shape.

Conforms to Your Needs: Just spare 15minutes to wear it every day after after TV watching, book reading, computer/mobile surfing, staying up late or when it's hard to fall asleep, to give your eyes a rest, improve blood circulation around eye muscles to reduce dark circles and sleep better use eye massager stress relief machine

Rechargeable& Portable: Massage glasses Lightweight and foldable design eye massager electric,makes it easy carry on wherever you go. Rechargeable lithium battery and USB charging provide maximum portability. (during the charge the product will stop working).It is suitable for home, office and travelling, Enjoy it anytime anywhere.Maybe a little noise and lound is the function cause .that is normal. Warranty time over 2 years
